flags.loglevel: logging level for this command invocation

errors.noOrgFound: No org configuration found for name %s

publish.description: publishes one or more Experience Cloud communities

convert.description: converts a translation file from one format to another (e.g. from Salesforce Translation Format (STF) to Excel or viceversa)

flags.metadata: Comma-separated list of metadata component names
flags.sheets: Comma-separated list of XLSX sheet names
flags.rowheadernum: Index (starts from 1) of the row that contains the header

errors.noInputFileFound: Input file not found or you don't have read access to it
errors.outputFileError: Error writing to output file. Make sure you have proper access to it
errors.invalidStfNoHeader: Invalid stf file, no translation information defined
errors.invalidStfType: Invalid stf file, stf file type is invalid
errors.invalidStfFormat: Invalid stf file, stf file format is invalid
errors.oneOrMoreSheetsNotFound: One or more Excel Sheet do not exist

patch.description: patches source metadata files in order to solve common Salesforce deployment bugs or to modifly on the fly API endpoints

flags.env: Environment name used to select the correct patch set from sfdx-project.json
flags.outsourcedir: the output directory to store the patched source files
flags.outmanifestdir: the output directory to store the patched manifest file (package.xml)
flags.rootdir: the input directory that contains the source files to be patched
flags.inmanifestdir: the input manifest (package.xml) file describing the contents of the source files
flags.fixes: file path of a JSON that describes the set of fixes and/or patches  to be made
flags.mdapimapfile: file with JSON that maps workspaces files (using source structure) to mdapi files. Not intended to be used when invoked directly, but when invoked by CLI Pre Deploy Hook.
flags.propfile: file path o a key-value declaration to be loaded as part of the environment variables to be seen by the command
flags.subpath: Optional subpath(s) between the root dir and the actual sources dir (where the profiles/, classes/, etc. are stored)

testdependencies.description: computes the list of (statically) dependant Apex Test Classes to a list of Apex Classes supplied in input up to a certain depth

flags.metadata: comma-separated list of Apex Class names
flags.nameconv: naming convention to apply to generate Apex Class Test names
flags.depth: how many iterations to perform while navigating the tree of dependencies
